title: American POW Released From Taliban After 5 Years
teaser: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl, an American soldier held captive by the Taliban for nearly five years, was released Saturday into U.S. custody. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with correspondent Tom Bowman about the deal that secured Bergdahl's release.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
